Government has reduced the GST rates for hotels from 18% to 5% but the Hotels are using this as a tool for increasing their prices. Assistant Vice President / Head - Global Talent Acquisition at Incedo Inc.
November 1, 2017, Gaurav Singh managed Puja directly

Puja is consummate professional, unfailingly diplomatic, and at the same time unfailingly conscious of the objectives of her company and mission. She inspires respect from the people who work for her and also from those who work with her, even when differences in approach are significant.She has extremely good people skills, Top of the World Domain knowledge and is in general a very well connected individual. Highly focused and dedicated individual who demonstrates the drive and passion to innovatively get her job done. Her Delivery Management, Program Management and Interfacing skills are exemplary. She is analytical and has the perspective of looking into things from a different plane and neutrally which is helping her lot during the decision making times of being at helm for large initiatives and teams.Puja spearheaded several initiatives from thought-to-execution. She is a valued thought-partner in conceiving these - including research and content-authoring. She is known for her execution excellence and handled several complex assignments which required her to plan meticulously and trouble-shoot creatively. In addition, people-oriented attitude is extremely useful when it came to addressing complex employee - relations issues. A thorough team-player and leader, she is great asset to whichever team she is a part of. The way she manages and leads team towards the planning and implementation of human resources policies, programs, and practices is simply inspiring. She is detail oriented manager who watches work like a hawk without losing sight of the strategic objective.
Gaurav Singh Gaur

I would like to recommend Puja as a good professional, specialized in the area of Human Resources, She brought good fresh air to the organization as well as new ways of doing things. She is very honest and totally dedicated to the job. Puja is a motivated individual who always takes the extra step to assure she is satisfying everyone's needs. She is a pleasure to work with and will surely add value to any organization. Her professionalism and pleasant attitude are some of his best assets.Pleasure to work with puja when we both sit in Incedo office. She is a lady who has the ability to drive teams forward regardless of the difficulty. Her perspective on the "overall" picture and her understanding on what it takes to meet objectives is second to none. She is a strong listener and works to look far beyond to understand the situation and then contribute to the solution. With a friendly personality and the ability to foster positive relationships with people she works with, she was quite popular amongst her peers and supervisors. She possesses strong public relation skills and a great ability to remain organized at all times. In my opinion, she will be an excellent choice for any position to assist the human resources department of any company.I am confident that puja will be an excellent addition to your company – especially where professionalism and good ethics are concerned. If you need more information regarding her work profile, please feel free to contact me.
